system.description: You are a friendly face in the crowd.
system.basicAction: When you act as a shill, helping someone to persuade, cheat, swindle, or scam, you give them a +2 bonus for your help, instead of the normal +1.
system.advAction: You are an expert shill, and can offer excellent assistance to another character. Your help gives them a bonus success for free when you are working together on a scam.
